summary: The diff modifies AllLocationsMap.tsx, BirdDataTable.tsx, and BirdGallery.tsx as required. All three components implement the useState+useEffect pattern for isAdmin checks and data fetching. The implementation appears to cover the core requirements for REQ-107, REQ-108, and REQ-109 based on the available (truncated) diff content. Two additional files were also modified (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json), which are metadata/documentation files rather than functional components. The truncation of the diff prevents full verification of all acceptance criteria details.

hallucinated_features.description: frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json were modified in addition to the three allowed files
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request constraints state 'Do not change any file, component, page, route, or backend file beyond AllLocationsMap.tsx, BirdDataTable.tsx, and BirdGallery.tsx.'
